references.paper_title: Online vertex-weighted bipartite matching and single-bid budgeted allocations
references.reason: This paper is foundational for online bipartite matching, providing a basis for many of the algorithms and analyses in the current paper.
This paper establishes a key benchmark for online stochastic matching, which the current paper aims to improve upon in the context of fairness.

references.paper_title: An optimal algorithm for online bipartite matching
references.reason: This is a seminal paper in online matching that introduced many of the concepts and techniques that form the foundations of this area of research.

references.paper_title: Online stochastic matching, Poisson arrivals, and the natural linear program
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial analysis of online stochastic matching under Poisson arrivals, closely related to the setting considered in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Fairness maximization among offline agents in online-matching markets
references.reason: This paper is a related work by some of the same authors, extending the study of fairness in online matching to offline agents, providing additional context and insights.
